snippet: If the Colts do not pay his bonus, Peyton Manning will be one of the biggest names among the more than 500 N.F.L. players becoming available in free agency later this month.
lead_paragraph: If the Colts do not pay his bonus, Peyton Manning will be one of the biggest names among the more than 500 N.F.L. players becoming available in free agency later this month.

headline.seo: In N.F.L. Free Agency, Manning Is at the Top of the List of Tough Choices
headline.main: In N.F.L., Manning Tops List of Tough Choices
headline.print_headline: In N.F.L., Manning Tops List of Tough Choices
